title: uMSG
description: A small messaging app to help connect UW students. This was implemented with various data structures and sorting algorithms to learn how and when to use them.

title: StudySpark
description: StudySpark is a flashcard based studying application that helped me learn about frontend-tools and client-server interactions.

title: Flight_App
description: Flight management app powered by SQL Server to maintain a persistent database and allows concurrent use of many features.
